Bussolengo is an Italian town and comune: Bussolengo borders with the municipalities of Castelnuovo del Garda
column5: Sona and Verona. Its civil parish (frazione) is the village of San Vito al Mantico. One of its oldest churches is the frescoed church of San Valentino.
